parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Ex et ratione.","description":"Deleniti repudiandae rerum. Id veniam exercitationem. Quis consequuntur sint. Tempora dignissimos autem. Qui nesciunt atque.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-13","end_at":"2019-02-15","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
